description: A savoury take on a stuffing recipe with the crunchy texture of walnut.
name: Pear, Walnut & Blue Cheese Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium pear, de-cored and finely chopped
1 medium white onion, peeled and finely diced
1 medium red onion, peeled and finely diced
2 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Fry the onions, pear and garlic with the butter in the pan for 5 minutes while stirring.
Combine the breadcrumbs with the rest of the ingredients in a separate bowl. Now add the melted butter mix into the bowl and combine fully.
Transfer the total mixture to a baking tray and bake for 20 minutes and then remove from the heat.
